entry.title: https://github.com/apache/bigtop
entry.content: Bigtop is an Apache Foundation project for Infrastructure Engineers and Data Scientists looking for comprehensive packaging, testing, and configuration of the leading open source big data components.

entry.title: https://github.com/openboxes/openboxes
entry.content: OpenBoxes is a supply chain management system designed to manage inventory and track stock movements for healthcare facilities.
